name: A multithreaded PPHPC replication in Java

affiliation.name: Universidade Lusófona de Humanidades e Tecnologias

citation.text: Fachada N, Lopes VV, Martins RC, Rosa AC. (2015) Towards a standard model for research in agent-based modeling and simulation. PeerJ Computer Science 1:e36 https://dx.doi.org/10.7717/peerj-cs.36

description:
A multithreaded Java implementation of the [PPHPC](https://www.openabm.org/model/4693/) Agent-Based Model, developed with two goals in mind: 

1. Compare the performance of this implementation with an existing NetLogo implementation.
2. Study how different parallelization strategies impact simulation performance on a shared memory architecture.
releaseNotes: Update reference article with final published version.
referencePublication: Fachada, N., Lopes, V.V., Martins, R.C., Rosa, A.C., Parallelization strategies for spatial agent-based models, International Journal of Parallel Programming, 2016, http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/s10766-015-0399-9 (arXiv preprint available at http://arxiv.org/abs/1507.04047)
